languages.text: "Я разжигаю искру Последнего восхода. Порой будущее, являемое в видениях Предела рассвета, дробится в гранях возможностей, и облик его бывает неясен. Я видела, что это место важно для грядущего, и разгадала головоломку. Во вспышке чистоты сей мир изменится, приблизится к {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериуму{/g} и переродится в нем. Ложноверцы сгинут в огне, а преданные обретут в нем спасение и новую форму".

traits.locale_text: "Я разжигаю искру Последнего восхода. Порой будущее, являемое в видениях Предела рассвета, дробится в гранях возможностей, и облик его бывает неясен. Я видела, что это место важно для грядущего, и разгадала головоломку. Во вспышке чистоты сей мир изменится, приблизится к {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериуму{/g} и переродится в нем. Ложноверцы сгинут в огне, а преданные обретут в нем спасение и новую форму".

languages.text: "I am lighting the spark of the Final Dawn. Sometimes the future revealed in the Edge of Daybreak's visions is fragmented between the facets of possibility, and the view is unclear. I have glimpsed the importance of this place for what is to come, and I have solved the puzzle. The flash of purity will transform this world and bring it closer to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, in which it will be reborn. False believers will perish in the fire, whilst the faithful will find their salvation and their new form in it."
languages.original_text: "Я разжигаю искру Последнего восхода. Порой будущее, являемое в видениях Предела рассвета, дробится в гранях возможностей, и облик его бывает неясен. languages.text: "Ich entzünde den Funken der Letzten Dämmerung. Die Zukunft, die in den Visionen des Rands des Tagesanbruchs offenbart wart, ist manchmal fragmentiert zwischen den verschiedenen Facetten der Möglichkeit, man sieht sie nicht ganz klar. Ich habe erkannt, wie wichtig diese Welt für alles Kommende ist, und ich habe das Rätsel gelöst. Der Blitz der Reinheit wird diese Welt verwandeln und näher an das {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} heranbringen, in dem sie wiedergeboren wird. Falsche Gläubige werden im Feuer sterben, während die wahren Gläubigen darin ihre Erlösung und ihre neue Gestalt finden werden."
languages.original_text: "I am lighting the spark of the Final Dawn. Sometimes the future revealed in the Edge of Daybreak's visions is fragmented between the facets of possibility, and the view is unclear. I have glimpsed the importance of this place for what is to come, and I have solved the puzzle. False believers will perish in the fire, whilst the faithful will find their salvation and their new form in it."

Falsche Gläubige werden im Feuer sterben, während die wahren Gläubigen darin ihre Erlösung und ihre neue Gestalt finden werden."

languages.text: « Je compte allumer l'étincelle de l'Aube finale. Parfois, l'avenir révélé dans les visions de la Lame de l'Aube est fragmenté selon les différentes facettes des possibilités, ce qui rend la vision trouble. L'importance de cet endroit pour ce qui adviendra m'a été révélée, et j'en ai élucidé l'énigme. L'éclair de pureté transformera ce monde et le rapprochera de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, dans lequel il renaîtra. Les mécréants périront par le feu, alors que les fidèles y trouveront le salut et une nouvelle forme. »
languages.original_text: "I am lighting the spark of the Final Dawn. Sometimes the future revealed in the Edge of Daybreak's visions is fragmented between the facets of possibility, and the view is unclear. I have glimpsed the importance of this place for what is to come, and I have solved the puzzle. The flash of purity will transform this world and bring it closer to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, in which it will be reborn. False believers will perish in the fire, whilst the faithful will find their salvation and their new form in it."

traits.locale_text: « Je compte allumer l'étincelle de l'Aube finale. Les mécréants périront par le feu, alors que les fidèles y trouveront le salut et une nouvelle forme. »

languages.text: “我打算点亮终末黎明的火花。有时候，破晓锋刃所展现的未来过于破碎，过于模糊。它的预言不够明朗，充斥着种种可能。不过我已经窥见，这个地方对即将到来的一切起到至关重要的作用。我已解开了这个谜题，纯净的光芒将会改变这个世界，让它更加贴近{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}。在那里，小莱卡德将会得到重生，伪神的信徒将在烈焰中灭亡，虔诚之人则会寻得救赎与新生。”
languages.original_text: "I am lighting the spark of the Final Dawn. Sometimes the future revealed in the Edge of Daybreak's visions is fragmented between the facets of possibility, and the view is unclear. I have glimpsed the importance of this place for what is to come, and I have solved the puzzle. The flash of purity will transform this world and bring it closer to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, in which it will be reborn. False believers will perish in the fire, whilst the faithful will find their salvation and their new form in it."

traits.locale_text: “我打算点亮终末黎明的火花。有时候，破晓锋刃所展现的未来过于破碎，过于模糊。它的预言不够明朗，充斥着种种可能。不过我已经看到，这个地方对即将到来的一切起到至关重要的作用。我已解开了这个谜题，纯净的光芒将会改变这个世界，让它更加贴近{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}。在那里，小莱卡德将会得到重生，伪神的信徒将在烈焰中灭亡，虔诚之人则会寻得救赎与新生。”

languages.text: 「私は最後の夜明けの火花を灯している。暁の刃のビジョンが見せる未来は、可能性の面と面の間でバラバラになって、姿がハッキリしないことがあるのだ。私は、来たる未来にとってのこの場所の重要性を光り輝かせ、謎を解いてきた。ピュリティの閃光がこの世界の姿を変え、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}へと近づけ、そこで生まれ変わる。偽りの信者は火の中で滅び、真の信者は、その中で救いと新しい姿を見つけるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I am lighting the spark of the Final Dawn. Sometimes the future revealed in the Edge of Daybreak's visions is fragmented between the facets of possibility, and the view is unclear. I have glimpsed the importance of this place for what is to come, and I have solved the puzzle. The flash of purity will transform this world and bring it closer to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, in which it will be reborn. False believers will perish in the fire, whilst the faithful will find their salvation and their new form in it."

traits.locale_text: 「私は最後の夜明けの火花を灯している。暁の刃のビジョンが見せる未来は、可能性の面と面の間でバラバラになって、姿がハッキリしないことがあるのだ。私は、来たる未来にとってのこの場所の重要性を光り輝かせ、謎を解いてきた。ピュリティの閃光がこの世界の姿を変え、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}に近づけて、そこで生まれ変わる。偽りの信者は火の中で滅び、真の信者は、その中で救いと新しい姿を見つけるだろう」

languages.text: «Estoy encendiendo la chispa del Amanecer Final. A veces, el futuro revelado en las visiones del Filo del Amanecer está fragmentado entre las facetas de la posibilidad, y la visión es confusa. He vislumbrado la importancia de este lugar para lo que está por venir, y he resuelto el rompecabezas. El destello de pureza transformará este mundo y lo acercará al {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g}, en el que renacerá. Los falsos creyentes perecerán en el fuego, mientras que los fieles encontrarán en él su salvación y su nueva forma».
languages.original_text: "I am lighting the spark of the Final Dawn. Sometimes the future revealed in the Edge of Daybreak's visions is fragmented between the facets of possibility, and the view is unclear. I have glimpsed the importance of this place for what is to come, and I have solved the puzzle. The flash of purity will transform this world and bring it closer to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, in which it will be reborn. False believers will perish in the fire, whilst the faithful will find their salvation and their new form in it."

languages.text: "Nihai Şafak'ın fitilini ateşliyorum. Bazen Tan Vakti'nin görülerinde müjdelenen gelecek, parçalanmış olasılıklardan ibaret ve müphemdir. Bu mekânın ileride oynayacağı mühim rolü gördüm ve bulmacayı çözdüm. Saflığın infilakı, bu dünyayı kökten değiştirip {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar'a{/g} yaklaştıracak. Dünya yeniden doğacak. Alevler sahte inançlıları yutacak, yürekten inananlar ise kurtuluşa erip yeni bir surete bürünecekler."
languages.original_text: "I am lighting the spark of the Final Dawn. Sometimes the future revealed in the Edge of Daybreak's visions is fragmented between the facets of possibility, and the view is unclear. I have glimpsed the importance of this place for what is to come, and I have solved the puzzle. The flash of purity will transform this world and bring it closer to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, in which it will be reborn. False believers will perish in the fire, whilst the faithful will find their salvation and their new form in it."

traits.locale_text: "Nihai Şafak'ın fitilini ateşliyorum. Bazen... Tan Vakti'nin görülerinde müjdelenen gelecek, parçalanmış olasılıklardan ibaret ve müphemdir. Bu mekânın gelecekte oynayacağı rolü görmeyi başardım ve bulmacayı çözdüm. Arınmanın alevleri, bu dünyayı kökten değiştirip {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar{/g}'a yaklaştıracak. Dünya yeniden doğacak. Alevler, çarpık inananları yutacak, gerçek inananlar ise kurtuluşa erip yeni bir surete bürünecekler."
